backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, test handling, course progress, news cache, and progress reports with access control and migration hook.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new structure by adding an empty progressReports map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and design tokens defining light/dark theme colors and global UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, setting metadata, and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup defining all application routes and installing the OpenAI request blocker.
frontend/src/components/course/StoryMode: UI card component displaying story-mode details for a lesson topic or vocabulary word.
frontend/src/components/friendChat/ChatG: Alert component showing built-in assistant or power mode notice with dynamic styling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsFallbac: Provides a fallback UI to enter, validate, save, and open a custom news URL in an iframe when region news is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: Renders a news item with headline, preview, and a text‑to‑speech play/stop control.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Displays region-specific news with loading, error, empty, and content states, using NewsItemRow or a fallback browser.
frontend/src/components/news/TopUSHeadli: Shows top US headlines with loading, error, empty, and parsed news display using NewsItemRow.
frontend/src/components/progress/Mistake: Displays learned items and improvement areas from useMistakeTracker with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/proInterviewer/B: Floating microphone toggle button that visually indicates active recording state.
frontend/src/components/test/ResultEffec: Shows a confetti animation on a fullscreen canvas when enabled.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Config toggling between demo and backend news data sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiMode.ts: Determines whether AI mode is active based on key validity and connection status, with error handling utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourseProgress.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, course progress, day lock states, and submitting test scores via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterviewReports.t: Hooks for retrieving and adding interview analysis reports through backend actor calls, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSettings.ts: Manages browser-local settings such as API keys and provider status, with helpers to update and compute provider states.
frontend/src/hooks/useMistakeTracker.ts: Loads, updates, and persists mistake-tracker data in local storage using a simple state hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePowerMode.ts: Handles local storage and validation of an OpenAI API key to determine Power Mode activation without transmitting data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching region-specific news and forcing refreshes through backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Wraps news queries with region mapping, parsing, demo-mode behavior, timestamp tracking, and bulk refetch controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements local speech-to-text recognition using the Web Speech API with event handling and no external data transmission.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSNews.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and refresh US news via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, and utility classes including glassmorphism and neon effects.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1LessonConten: Stores Day 1 lesson content including grammar topics and vocabulary with story-based explanations.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1TestQuestion: Contains multiple‑choice test questions for Day 1 focused on is/am/are usage.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayGrammarChec: Checks essay lines for grammar errors using detectAndCorrect and returns correction details.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayPowerModeFe: Generates enhanced essay feedback with corrections, suggestions, and a score.
frontend/src/lib/course/types.ts: Defines shared types for lesson topics, story mode sections, and vocabulary words.
frontend/src/lib/friendChat/types.ts: Defines the ChatMessage structure for user–tutor chat interactions.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/analyzeUser: Analyzes user messages for grammar, tone, vocabulary, and power answers.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/detectAndCo: Implements rule‑based grammar detection and correction for simple English mistakes.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generatePow: Generates enhanced, on-device tutor replies with safety checks and detailed responses based on message patterns. Handles greetings, farewells, questions, short messages, and long messages.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generateTut: Produces tutor replies with personality modes and basic safety filtering. Includes pattern-based responses for greetings, farewells, questions, and gratitude.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/powerAnswer: Defines regex rules for detecting simple phrases and suggesting more advanced alternatives. Exposes a function that returns the first matching power-up suggestion.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/progressRep: Tracks session facts such as grammar corrections, tone, and vocabulary suggestions, and generates a formatted progress report. Provides helpers to initialize and update session data.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Provides deterministic demo news items for several regions. Used as placeholder data during development and testing.
frontend/src/lib/news/fallbackNewsUrlSto: Stores, retrieves, and clears region-specific fallback news URLs in localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews API JSON responses into clean news items with sanitized previews. Handles API errors and malformed or empty input safely.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Defines available news regions with IDs, names, and flags. Exports a static list of region configurations.
frontend/src/lib/news/validateHttpUrl.ts: Validates and normalizes HTTP/HTTPS URLs, enforcing allowed protocols and returning descriptive errors. Auto-prepends https:// when missing.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/powerModeStor: Manages localStorage persistence of the user's OpenAI API key, ensuring it remains client-side only.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/validateOpenA: Validates OpenAI API key format, allowing empty keys and requiring non-empty keys to start with 'sk-'.
frontend/src/lib/progress/mistakeTracker: Provides localStorage helpers for reading and saving Mistake Tracker items.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/coachAns: Provides grammar correction, filler-word detection, pronunciation guidance, and category-based pro tips for an interview answer.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/document: Defines interfaces for uploaded documents, extracted data, interview questions, feedback, metrics, and utility to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/extractT: Returns a failure response for OCR since no OCR library is available, instructing users to provide manual text input.
Performs basic PDF text extraction via FileReader and TextDecoder, returning fallback text if extraction fails.
Computes logic, clarity, filler count, and sentence metrics from a transcript and aggregates multiple metric sets.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/question: Generates interview questions from extracted document data, manual notes, and optional DAF mode with UPSC-style prompts.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/sessionR: Builds a session report with scoring, body‑language inference, logical consistency notes, and improvement suggestions.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/summariz: Extracts keywords, skills, education, roles, and achievements from raw text using pattern matching.
frontend/src/lib/security/blockOpenAIReq: Installs runtime guards blocking fetch/XHR requests to OpenAI domains for security compliance.
frontend/src/lib/security/noOpenAIPolicy: Documents the policy forbidding OpenAI API integration and lists allowed client‑side alternatives.
frontend/src/lib/settings/localSettingsS: Provides localStorage-based getters and setters for API keys and feature toggles, plus a clear-all helper.
frontend/src/lib/settings/providerStatus: Determines provider connection status based on enable flags and API key validation results.
frontend/src/lib/settings/validateKeys.t: Implements lightweight format checks for OpenAI and Gemini API keys without network calls.
frontend/src/lib/tts/speakText.ts: Wrapper around browser speechSynthesis to speak text with cleanup, voice selection, and error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Renders a generic coming-soon page with feature name display and a back-to-home button.
frontend/src/pages/Day1LearningHubPage.t: Displays Day 1 course content including grammar, vocabulary, and essay sections with navigation to the test.
frontend/src/pages/Day1TestPage.tsx: Implements Day 1 quiz flow, score calculation, effects, and backend score submission.
frontend/src/pages/FriendChatPage.tsx: Provides an AI friend chat interface with speech-to-text, grammar correction, and offline tutor reply generation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard rendering navigation buttons linking to core app features and top US headline news.
frontend/src/pages/MyProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress for the 60‑day course with stats, interview reports, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows regional news sections with optional demo mode and supports refreshing all news feeds.
Guides users through uploading materials, running an AI‑driven interview, recording answers, and generating a session report.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings interface for managing local API keys, feature toggles, and app configuration stored in local storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, fonts, shadows, keyframes, and animations for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking feature requirements, summaries, and pending requests for news fallback URLs and the Interview feature workflow.
